SEARCH
Package source.Entity

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
source.Entity.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
The Enquiry class holds information about enquiries made to a camp by a particular student.
Since:
11/4/2023
Author:
Edwin Lim
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String campName, String createdBy, String repliedBy, String content, String title, String reply, LocalDate createdDate, LocalDate repliedDate)
      An overloaded constructor
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp that this enquiry belongs to.
      createdBy - The user ID of the student that created this enquiry
      repliedBy - Denotes the user id of who replied to this enquiry ( a staff id )
      content - The content of the enquiry
      title - The title of the enquiry
      reply - The reply to this enquiry
      createdDate - The local date timestamp of when the enquiry was created
      repliedDate - The local date timestamp of when the enquiry was replied
